Staple-based art: Create a stapler that can create intricate and beautiful designs on paper using different types of staples. This could be a fun and creative way for people to express their artistic side. Confidence score: 0.8

Staple-powered 3D printing: Develop a stapler that can be used as a 3D printing tool by using staples as the building blocks. This could revolutionize the 3D printing industry by providing a cost-effective and sustainable alternative to traditional 3D printing methods. Confidence score: 0.9

Staple-based fastening for delicate materials: Create a stapler that can fasten delicate materials such as fabric, paper, or even skin without causing damage. This could be useful for medical professionals, tailors, or anyone who needs to fasten delicate materials. Confidence score: 0.7

Smart stapler with AI capabilities: Develop a stapler that can recognize and sort documents based on their content using AI algorithms. This could help businesses streamline their document management processes and reduce errors. Confidence score: 0.8

Staple-based modular construction: Create a stapler that can be used to build structures using staples as the building blocks. This could be a fun and creative way for people to build structures such as bridges, towers, or even entire buildings. Confidence score: 0.9
